(Simplified: 掸)
Chinese Definition:
Pictophonetic: 單 indicates the sound; 扌 (hand) conveys the meaning.
  • ⿰ Left to right
    • 扌 [ shǒu ] hand
    • 單 [ dān ] single, individual, only; lone
①用雞毛或布條綁成的除塵用具：撣子。撣帚。撣甩子。
②用撣子輕輕拂打或抽：撣得很乾淨。
撣子 [ dǎn zi ]: duster; Classifiers: 把
(Simplified: 掸)
Chinese Definition:
Pictophonetic: 單 indicates the sound; 扌 (hand) conveys the meaning.
Hanzi: 掸

Main pronunciation 主要发音: dǎn

Other pronunciations 其它发音: Not exists.

Original meaning 本义: Meaning to dust.

English senses 英语理解: to dust; a duster

Usage example 用法举例: 撣子 dǎn zǐ (whisk)

Importance by frequency 常用频率: 3550

Shuowen 说文解字: 提持也從手單聲讀若行遲驒驒

Character decomposition 字形分解 :
Compound 撣 from hand-left 扌 shǒu and phonetic sling (单)單 dān simp 掸.

撣字的基本解释

撣
dǎn

撣
shàn
均见“掸”。

撣字的汉语字典释义

[①]［chán］
［《廣韻》市連切，平仙，禪。］
［《集韻》澄延切，平仙，澄。］
“掸1”的繁体字。
(1)牵引。
(2)相缠不去。参见“撣撣”。
(3)调戏。
[②]［dǎn］
亦作“撢2”。“掸2”的繁体字。
(1)拂；拂拭。
(2)筛。
[③]［shàn］
［《集韻》唐干切，平寒，定。］
“掸3”的繁体字。
(1)古国名。
(2)中南半岛民族名。主要分布在缅甸东部的掸邦，部分在克钦邦等地，少数住在泰国。
[④]［tān］
［《集韻》他干切，平寒，透。］
“掸4”的繁体字。
持不坚；瘫倒。
[⑤]［dàn］
［《廣韻》徒案切，去翰，定。］
［《廣韻》徒干切，平寒，定。］
“掸5”的繁体字。
(1)触。
(2)用同“彈”。
[⑥]［dān］
同“殫1”。“掸6”的繁体字。

撣字的康熙字典解释

【卯集中】【手字部】　撣； 康熙笔画：16； 页码：页455第09
【唐韻】徒旱切【集韻】蕩旱切，?但上聲。【說文】提持也。【揚子·太?經】何福滿肩，提禍撣撣。【註】撣撣，敬也。何福持禍而自儆戒也。　又【唐韻】徒干切【集韻】【韻會】唐干切【正韻】唐闌切，?音檀。觸也。　又與彈通。鼓絃也。　又國名。【後漢·西南夷傳】撣國，西南通大秦。　又【唐韻】【集韻】【韻會】徒案切【正韻】杜案切，?音憚。亦觸也。　又【唐韻】市連切【集韻】時連切，?音蟬。撣援，牽引也。　又【集韻】澄延切，音纏。相纏不去也。　又人名。【前漢·宣帝紀】日逐王先賢撣來降。　又亭年切，音田。陼名。【山海經】靑要之山，南望撣陼。　又他干切，音灘。持不堅也。　又旨善切，饘上聲。排急也。

Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［chán］
["Guangyun" City Lianqie, Pingxian, Zen. ]
["Jiyun" Cheng Yanqie, Pingxian, Cheng. ]
Traditional characters for "Shan 1".
(1) Traction.
(2) Can't get entangled. See "Shan Shan".
(3) Mocking.
[②]［dǎn］
Also known as "撢2". Traditional characters for "Shan 2".
(1) Whisk; wipe.
(2) Sieve.
[③]［shàn］
["Ji Yun" Tang Qianqie, Ping Han, Ding. ]
Traditional characters for "Shan 3".
(1) Ancient country name.
(2) Names of nationalities in the Indochina Peninsula. They are mainly distributed in Shan State in eastern Myanmar, some in Kachin State and other places, and a few live in Thailand.
[④]［tān］
["Ji Yun" he cuts dry, calm and thorough. ]
Traditional characters for "Shan 4".
Don't hold on; collapse.
[⑤]［dàn］
["Guangyun" only case cut, go to Han, set. ]
["Guangyun" is only dry cut, calm and fixed. ]
Traditional characters for "Shan 5".
(1) Touch.
(2) Use the same "bomb".
[⑥]［dān］
Same as "Chang 1". Traditional characters for "Shan 6".

[Mao Collection] [Hand Character Department] 　 Shan; Kangxi strokes: 16; Page number: Page 455 09
[Tang Yun] Dry dry cut [Ji Yun] Drift dry cut, but sound. [Said Wen] Support also. 【Yangtze·Tai? Scripture】He Fu is full of shoulders, and shovels disasters. [Note] Shan Shan, Jing Ye. He Fu holds the misfortune and warns himself.　[Tang Yun] Discrete dry cut [Ji Yun] [Yun Hui] Tang dry cut [Zheng Yun] Tang Lan cut,? Yin Tan. Touch also.　Connect with bomb again. Drum strings also.　 Also the name of the country. [Later Han·Xinyi Biography] Shan State, southwest through Daqin.　[Tang Yun] [Ji Yun] [Yun Hui] Disciple Case Cut [Zheng Yun] Du Case Cut,? Yin Shao. Also touched.　[Tang Yun] City Lianqie 【Jiyun】When he cuts repeatedly, it sounds like a cicada. Shan aid, traction.　 [Ji Yun] Cheng Yan cuts, the sound is tangled. Can't get entangled.　Another name. [Pre-Han·Xuan Di Ji] The kings and sages came and descended in the day.　Ting Nian cut again, Otoda. Name. 【Shan Hai Jing】The main mountain of Qiang, looking south at Shan Ku.　He did it again, Yintan. It's not firm.　The purpose is good and cut, and the voice is on. Urgent too.
